revisions.text: Ethical issues in AI healthcare can be grouped into categories: (1) Informed consent – patients may not understand how their data is used; (2) Fairness – algorithms may treat different populations unequally; (3) Reliability – AI systems can make incorrect or harmful decisions if not thoroughly validated.
